items.title: Jim Cramer reviews some of the 'terrifying' ups and downs of earnings season
items.summary: Jim Cramer reviews the challenges of predicting stock action during earnings season on Wall Street.

items.title: Microsoft begins testing sharing your desktop with Copilot on Windows 11 — allows AI to view and chat about what's on your screen
items.summary: Microsoft is testing sharing your desktop with Copilot on Windows 11, allowing AI to view and chat about what's on your screen.

items.title: Zuckerberg: Top AI Talent Has 3 Asks
items.summary: Mark Zuckerberg highlights the three main requests top AI researchers have when considering job opportunities, emphasizing that salary is just one aspect. The Meta CEO shared insights on attracting AI talent during an interview on The Information's TITV program.

items.title: Drone startup Xtend raises another $30M in funding
items.summary: Drone startup Xtend raises $30M in funding led by Aliya Capital Partners and Protego Ventures for developing drone technology in the defense sector.

items.title: OpenEvidence raises $210M on $3.5B valuation to expand AI-powered medical search and decision tools
items.summary: OpenEvidence raises $210M on $3.5B valuation to expand AI-powered medical search and decision tools.

items.title: Apple researchers taught an AI model to reason about app interfaces
items.summary: Apple researchers collaborated with Aalto University in Finland to create ILuvUI, an AI model trained to understand mobile app interfaces through screenshots and natural language conversations.

items.title: Show HN: Vezeto – Android app for travelers powered by AI
items.summary: During travels, the Vezeto Android app for travelers powered by AI helps users find information about lesser-known attractions, especially in smaller towns, where internet information may need translation or may be lacking.

items.title: Repost: Tidy RAG in R with ragnar
items.summary: The ragnar package in R allows for retrieval augmented generation (RAG) for scraping text from websites and using it for various applications.

items.title: The Chainsmokers' Mantis Ventures closes $100M third fund | TechCrunch
items.summary: The Chainsmokers' Mantis Ventures has closed a $100M third fund for investing in startups.
